title: Network Packet Analyzer
description: A packet sniffing and analysis tool that captures live TCP/IP traffic using Scapy and summarizes statistics such as packet counts, protocol distribution, and top talkers over a configurable time window. Includes filtering by IP, port, and protocol, as well as CSV export for offline analysis.

title: 2D Unity Platformer
description: A 2D platformer built in Unity featuring physics-based character movement, enemy AI with patrol and chase behaviors, collectible items, and scene transitions. Includes a main menu, pause system, and basic sound design.

title: Flask REST API with Blueprint Architecture
description: A modular RESTful API built with Flask using Blueprints to separate routes and logic. Implements CRUD operations for multiple resources, JWT-based authentication, request validation, and structured error handling. Designed with scalability and clean architecture in mind.

title: Dockerized Reverse Proxy Setup
description: A multi-container Docker setup with separate web applications behind an Nginx reverse proxy. Supports domain-based routing (e.g., app1.localhost, app2.localhost), SSL configuration with self-signed certificates, and automated image builds using GitHub Actions.

title: Interactive Route Visualization App
description: An Android application that fetches route data from OpenRouteService and visualizes it on an interactive map. Displays step-by-step directions, distance, and estimated travel time. Implements asynchronous network requests and JSON parsing.

title: TCP Chat Server with Custom Protocol
description: A multi-client TCP chat server built using Python's socket library. Implements a custom message framing protocol, supports concurrent clients using threading or asyncio, and includes basic command handling (nicknames, private messages, broadcast).

title: Personal Portfolio with React and TypeScript
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with React and TypeScript. Features dynamic project pages rendered from JSON data, client-side routing, reusable components, and scoped styling with CSS Modules. Includes smooth navigation between project detail views and the main listing page.
